noHistory: No history available yet. Add measurements to see your progress!
noComparison: No comparison data available. Join a challenge to compare with others!

vo2max.title: Add VO2Max
vo2max.subtitle: Upload a screenshot or enter the value manually

sources.title: VO2Max Sources:
sources.whoop: WHOOP doesn't share VO2Max via API — upload a screenshot from the app.
sources.apple: Apple Watch shows VO2Max, but Apple Health isn't directly integrated.

upload.label: Upload Screenshot
upload.success: Screenshot uploaded! AI is analyzing data...
upload.fallback: Screenshot uploaded, but auto-analysis is unavailable. Enter the value manually.

manual.label: VO2Max (ml/kg/min)
manual.validation: VO2Max must be between 10 and 100 ml/kg/min

inbody.minMeasurements: Upload at least 2 measurements to display progression charts

insights.title: DID YOU KNOW?
insights.bmrMaintenance: With your BMR of {{bmr}} kcal, you need ~{{maintenance}} kcal daily to maintain weight
insights.armMuscle: Arm muscle mass {{avg}}% of norm - excellent results for strength training!
insights.visceralFatHealthy: Visceral fat level {{value}} cm² - within healthy range!
insights.visceralFatHigh: Visceral fat {{value}} cm² - consider more cardio and nutrition focus
insights.bodyFatAthletic: Body fat {{value}}% - excellent indicator for athletic physique

sources.inbodyDesc: Precise segmental analysis from InBody scan
sources.estimatedDesc: Synthesized from weight and body fat data
sources.synthesizedWarning: Segmental data is estimated. For precise analysis, schedule an InBody scan.
